decks.notes: The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo involving Amalia Benavides Aguirre, Cenote Scout, and Aetherflux Reservoir to generate a large amount of life gain and deal lethal damage to the opponent. The deck includes various support cards such as Collected Company, Chord of Calling, and Selfless Savior to help find and protect key pieces of the combo. The mana base is designed to support the deck's dual-color requirements, with additional cards like Prosperous Innkeeper and Wildgrowth Walker to generate extra value and sustain the player's life total.

This Pioneer Aggro deck focuses on utilizing Arclight Phoenix as a recurring threat by casting multiple spells in a turn to trigger its ability. The deck includes efficient removal spells like Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe, along with card draw spells like Opt and Treasure Cruise to quickly fill the graveyard and bring back the Phoenix. Hall of Storm Giants provides a powerful finisher, while Picklock Prankster disrupts the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with quick creature damage and spell recursion.

This deck focuses on using artifacts to quickly build a board presence and deal damage to the opponent. Utilizing cards like Smuggler's Copter, Ensoul Artifact, and Shrapnel Blast, the deck aims to both control the board and go for direct damage. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra layer of consistency to the deck. By combining aggression with artifact synergy, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory in a fast-paced Pioneer 1 vs 1 match.

The deck focuses on maximizing green mana production and devotion to green in order to play powerful green creatures and spells. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive plays, using cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Leyline of the Guildpact to ramp up mana quickly. Key cards include Outcaster Trailblazer, Cavalier of Thorns, and Old-Growth Troll, supported by Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner for card draw and ramp. Lair of the Hydra and Boseiju, Who Endures provide additional utility and protection. The strategy relies on building a strong board presence and pressuring the opponent early on.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using Amalia Benavides Aguirre, along with cards like Collected Company and Chord of Calling to search for key pieces. Cards like Aetherflux Reservoir and Wildgrowth Walker help generate life gain and trigger additional effects. The inclusion of creatures like Dina, Soul Steeper and Skyclave Apparition provide additional utility and disruption, while mana fixing lands like Blooming Marsh and Temple Garden ensure consistency in casting spells. By efficiently building up resources and controlling the board, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory through its combo strategy.

The deck focuses on controlling the game using a variety of spells and versatile creatures, with the goal of outvaluing the opponent. Niv-Mizzet Reborn acts as a powerful card draw engine, ensuring the player has access to a wide range of options. The deck includes a diverse range of lands to support its 5-color mana base and utilize Bring to Light to tutor for key cards. The inclusion of Leyline Binding and Vanishing Verse provides removal options, while cards like Sylvan Caryatid and Yorion, Sky Nomad offer additional utility and resilience. Ultimately, the deck aims to outgrind opponents with its card advantage and versatility.
